com.facebook.buck.skylark.parser

Class RuleFunctionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.skylark.parser.RuleFunctionFactory

  • public class RuleFunctionFactory
extends Object
    Responsible for creating instances of Skylark functions based on Buck's BaseDescriptions.

    For example for a JavaLibraryDescription instance, a Skylark function using snake case of its name prefix will be created - java_library.

    Callers can setup created functions in the Environment.
